com.camerontec.catalys.util.thread

Class ManagedThreadHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.util.thread.ManagedThread
      • com.camerontec.catalys.util.thread.ManagedThreadHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IManagedThreadCallbacks

    public abstract class ManagedThreadHelper
extends ManagedThread
implements IManagedThreadCallbacks
    This is a simple wrapper class for thread that allows for a clean termination of the thread. Inheriting classes implement the process() method. An additional wakeThread() method can be overridden to accommodate the scenario where Thread.interrupt will not wake the thread from a sleep state.

      void wakeThread()
      This method can be overridden if there is a chance that a thread can not be interrupted using the interrupt method.

    • Method Detail

      • wakeThread

        public void wakeThread()
        This method can be overridden if there is a chance that a thread can not be interrupted using the interrupt method. For example when a thread is calling accept on a socket.
        Specified by:
        wakeThread in interface IManagedThreadCallbacks

      • process

        public abstract void process(int threadId)
                      throws Exception
        This method should be over written be the implementing class.
        Specified by:
        process in interface IManagedThreadCallbacks
        Parameters:
        threadId - thread ID
        Throws:
        Exception - exception
